Name: Splendorous Night: Overflowing Light
Desc: This stylish and magnificent lantern stand adorned with a pair of Liyue lanterns is a custom-made item specially designed for the Neighboring Nations Congenial Poetry Gala's lantern riddles event.\nIt is said that these lanterns are bright yet not gaudy or glaring, allowing guests to read the riddles written there easily without affecting their agile imaginations, and the well-balanced warmth of its colors adds just a bit of extra elegance to the poetry gala.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
